content: Combine the Chinese ancient poem "Using the Chinese ancient poem "Inspired by the Chinese ancient poem "夜色银河情一片。轻帐偷欢，银烛罗屏怨。", create an oil painting-style artwork that reflects the poetic charm and characters." as the source of inspiration, draw a realistic-style picture that highlights the scene details and atmosphere." with cyberpunk elements to design a unique image blending tradition and sci-fi.
author: 吴文英
